dict.acceptation: 公民的，市民的；文明的，有礼貌的；民用的，国民间的；[法]民事的，根据民法的；

sent.orig: Civil subject system is the core of civil law and precondition to establish civil legal relationship.
sent.trans: 主体制度是民法的核心制度，是建立民事法律关系的先决条件。

sent.orig: She works in the civil service. ; She works for the civil service.
sent.trans: 她在政府文职机关工作。

sent.orig: Then, civil service is deemed to basic system of civil litigation by the author.
sent.trans: 接着，将民事送达的地位归位于民事诉讼的基本制度。

sent.orig: Abstract The system of preservation of evidence civil is an important system the civil litigation law.
sent.trans: 中文摘要民事诉讼证据保全制度是民事诉讼法确定的一项重要证据制度，其重要性直接来源于证据的重要性。

sent.orig: He had been groomed for a career in the Civil Service/groomed as a future civil servant.
sent.trans: 他受过公务员职业培训。
